name: TAK Training
description: TAK Common Operating Picture training (tak.gov) - training units how to use application.

name: Increment Monitoring - Cargo Deployment Automation
description: Optimizing the increment monitoring process for mobility cargo by using QR codes/Teams/Sharepoint for associated paperwork.

name: Radio Sleeves
description: 3D printed sleevces protecting radio from common susceptibilities.

name: Weapons Check-in/out
description: Placing QR codes/barcodes on weapons to streamline check-in/out weapons to monitor users and created automated reports.

name: Austere Mesh Radio Networks
description: Evaluating the ability of mesh radio networks to solve the interoperability challenges of austere communications. Conducting testing with a variety of modernized equipment.
